text.text: In this 1st continent (Discover phase) you can explore (diverge) and understand rather than simply assume what the problem of your project is and how to solve it yourself. This continent involves, for example, speaking to and spending time with people who are affected by the circumstances of the topic. It contains countries (Empathising, Exploring) that are concepts you want to learn through travelling through several cities (tools) spread out in broad regions.

In this 2nd continent (Define phase), you can process the insights gathered in the 1st continent (Discover) and help you define them (narrow down / converge). You can visit countries that deal with Contextualising and Setting Criteria for your project.

In this 3rd continent (Develop phase), you are encouraged to give different answers (diverge again!) to the defined problem seeking inspiration from elsewhere and co-designing with a range of different people. This is a continent that allows again to expand/diverge in your already selected ideas from the previous continents/phases. This includes the countries of Ideating for Solutions, Prototyping, and Testing while Developing. Enjoy this fun continent!

In this country you can find cities (tools) that help you develop empathy with the users of your project, as well as, with your team members on a human level. This country is about training mainly your soft/interpersonal skills.

In this country you can find tools (cities) that help you explore and understand how to manage, organise, and frame your project and team on a structural level. This country is mainly about training your organisational skills.
In this country, you can find cities (tools) that help you develop your prototype, that is, an early sample, model or release of a product built to test a concept or process.
In this country, you can find cities (tools) that can help you start generate ideas for solutions.
In this country, you an find cities (tools) that help you test your intermediate solution(s) with your user, even though you are still developing and refining.

This 4th and final continent (Deliver phase) involves testing out different solutions at small-scale, rejecting those that will not work and improving the ones that will. Also, it helps you think how you take this project to the next level, or how you can promote it and present to the clients, and sustain it in the marketplace! This is a phase where you focus on (that is, converge) your final solution development. It includes the countries of Final Testing, Presenting Work, Canvasses, and Project Afterlife.
In this country, you can find cities (tools) that help you with testing your final solution(s) with the user. Be sure to check and test with your users several times before moving on!

Canvasses country
In this country, you can find cities (tools) on how to present your solutions to interested parties.
In this country, you can find cities (tools) to help you unlock the potential of your project by preparing for a future in the real world after production and distribution!
In this country, you can find cities (tools) that help you define the criteria your project should be based on.

In this country, you can visit different cities (tools) that can help you work out your project in more detail by, for example, identifying the specific research problem and question you want to tackle from the many that you have explored in the first phase (Discover).
